20110106044658.000|20110106044659.000|CC1|WASHBURN SCHOOL, THE PLACE WAS

20110106044701.000|20110106044702.000|CC1|THEN THEY FOUND THE GUY SAFE AT 
20110106044702.000|20110106044703.000|CC1|HOME.                           
20110106044703.000|20110106044705.000|CC1|IT WASN'T A HOSTAGE SITUATION.  
20110106044705.000|20110106044707.000|CC1|IT WAS A BUTT CALL.
